author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Political Correctness | Tea Party
text:
(Before It's News)
I highly recommend this video to all concerning the origin and purposes of Political Correctness. Both this video and the one which follows it, give a very good insight as to why and what it's agenda is!!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjaBpVzOohs
Just let it continue to view that one that follows..
Perhaps someone could bring this to the attention to Mr. Trump. If he hasn't seen it it will certainly reinforce his stance on the destruction that political correctness is doing to our nation!!
Christopher Cilley
christophercilley@yahoo.com
